scripts.build:dev: NODE_ENV=development webpack --require babel-register && npm run-script copy
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production webpack --require babel-register && npm run-script copy
scripts.build:server: NODE_ENV=production webpack --require babel-register --config-name server && npm run-script copy
scripts.build:front: NODE_ENV=production webpack --require babel-register --config-name front && npm run-script copy
scripts.copy: cp package.json dist/ && cp package-lock.json dist/
scripts.deploy: cd dist && git add . && git commit -a -m 'ðŸ“¤ Remote Push' && git push --set-upstream dragon master
scripts.build-deploy: npm run-script build:dev && npm run-script deploy
scripts.build-deploy:server: npm run-script build:server && npm run-script deploy
scripts.build-deploy:front: npm run-script build:front && npm run-script deploy
